job_tasks.phrase: you will wield the power of generative AI to design prompts that delve deep into the subject matter, commanding it to produce test content that's personalized, engaging, and rigorous.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the act of designing prompts for generative AI to produce specific content, which aligns with the definition of Prompt Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Your experience in quantitative measurement and educational content creation will help you synthesize complex frameworks into AI prompts, yielding razor-sharp test questions that align tightly with educational standards.
job_tasks.justification: This further elaborates on the process of using AI prompts to generate specific, aligned outputs, fitting the Prompt Engineering category.

job_tasks.phrase: You will then quality control your outputs by crafting AI-first rubrics, ensuring each question and answer hits the mark and stimulates curiosity, enriching the learning journey.
job_tasks.justification: Crafting rubrics with AI to evaluate AI-generated content is a direct application of prompt engineering and AI interaction for quality control.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyzing test results and student data to identify knowledge gaps and areas for improvement in our learning content
job_tasks.justification: This task involves analyzing data to derive insights, which falls under the broader umbrella of data management and analysis for model improvement, aligning with Data Engineering & Management.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with subject matter experts to address identified gaps and enhance our educational offerings
job_tasks.justification: While this involves collaboration, the core action is enhancing educational offerings, which implies integrating improvements into the existing system or product, fitting into Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Working across teams to improve our entire educational ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions working across teams to improve a system, which is a clear indicator of collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: partnering with subject matter experts to enhance our overall educational offerings.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration with other experts to achieve a common goal.

job_tasks.phrase: Participating in our "second brain" knowledge-sharing practices to contribute to and learn from our collective expertise
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to knowledge sharing and learning from collective expertise, which is a core aspect of communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and refining test content to meet rigorous educational standards, using a blend of psychometrics and generative AI tools
job_tasks.justification: This task involves using generative AI tools to create and refine content, directly aligning with the use of GenAI for content generation.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing assessment rubrics with the help of AI that evaluate the depth, alignment, and educational impact of the test content
job_tasks.justification: This task involves using AI to develop rubrics for evaluating AI-generated content, which is a specific application of prompt engineering and AI interaction.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing the quality of test content through a streamlined, iterative process for consistently superior and challenging assessments
job_tasks.justification: This describes an iterative refinement process for AI-generated content, fitting within the scope of prompt engineering and quality control of AI outputs.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyzing test results and student data to identify knowledge gaps and areas for improvement in our learning content
job_tasks.justification: This task involves analyzing data to identify areas for improvement, which falls under data analysis and management for enhancing educational content.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with subject matter experts to address identified gaps and enhance our educational offerings
job_tasks.justification: This task involves cross-functional collaboration to improve educational offerings, implying integration of insights and enhancements into the product.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying your psychometric expertise to develop and refine test content with the help of AI, ensuring the assessments are personalized, rigorous, and aligned with educational standards
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the use of AI to develop and refine test content, which is a core task of prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: contributing to the overall improvement of our learning ecosystem through cross-functional collaboration and data-driven insights.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates contributing to the improvement of an ecosystem, which implies integration and system enhancement, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating test content manually - you will be using generative AI tools (such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude etc.) for every task
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the use of generative AI tools for content creation, reinforcing the focus on prompt engineering.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on using generative AI tools to design prompts for creating test content and rubrics. While there is mention of analyzing data and collaborating, the core responsibility is the application of GenAI for content generation and quality control. There is no indication of traditional ML model development or core software engineering tasks like building production-grade code or managing MLOps pipelines. The role is predominantly centered around the specialized application of GenAI, making 'GenAI Specialist' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the tasks involved, explicitly stating the use of generative AI for content creation and the avoidance of traditional coding or manual test creation. The focus on prompt design and AI-driven quality control is unambiguous.
